code:
defmodule Solution do
  @spec shortest_beautiful_substring(s :: String.t, k :: integer) :: String.t
  def shortest_beautiful_substring(s, k) do
    s
    |> String.graphemes()
    |> Enum.reduce({[], 0, []}, fn
      "1", {temp, count, acc} when count < k ->
        {[["1"] | temp], count + 1, acc}
      "1", {temp, count, acc} ->
        new_temp = List.flatten(temp) ++ ["1"]
        {[], 0, [new_temp | acc]}
      "0", {temp, count, acc} when count == k ->
        {[], 0, [List.flatten(temp) | acc]}
      "0", {temp, count, acc} ->
        {["0" | temp], count, acc}
    end)
    |> (fn {temp, count, acc} -> 
          if count == k, do: [List.flatten(temp) | acc], else: acc
       end).()
    |> Enum.filter(&(&1 |> length == k))
    |> Enum.sort()
    |> Enum.min_by(&String.length/1, fn -> "" end)
  end
end
